Description.Text: Palazzo La Scala is located in the heart of Venice, between Calle Dei Fabbri and Calle de La Scale, nearby the well-known Rialto Bridge with its fish markets and the Accademia Galleries and the famous St. Mark's Square. Other Venetian landmarks such as Piazza San Marco and Ponte di Rialto are also nearby. Explore the most attractive sites in Venice including excursions to the many Islands in Venice's mystic lagoon and enjoy the local cuisine including the customary fish dishes at the numerous traditional Venetian restaurants. Palazzo La Scala offers 10 rooms and 3 suites, all equipped with the best and the latest of all comforts. The decor reflects the original architecture with maximum attention to detail in the newly renovated building. The rooms are supplied with telephone, satellite television with CNN and BBC, air conditioning, hairdryer, mini bar, safe deposit box, radio and Internet connection. All rooms have a 24hour room service facility and there are a number of non smoking rooms available. The hotel reception is on call for restaurant and theatre bookings, parking, water-taxi, Murano visits, concert reservations, currency exchange and baby-sitting. The hotel also arrange for free entrance to the Venice Casino and locker services. The Palazzo La Scala does not have its own restaurant but guests will find a variety of typical Venetian restaurants nearby where they can enjoy local cuisine. However in the morning the staff will be happy to serve guests a full continental buffet breakfast in the hotels breakfast room, which is, of course, included in the price of the room. The Palazzo La Scala's friendly and specialised staff will be at guests complete service all through the stay, making the time in Venice a relaxing and pleasurable experience.
